title: Calories in 5 Guys Burger
meta_description: Discover calories in 5 guys burger, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for their classic cheeseburger.
assumptions: Standard Five Guys cheeseburger: two beef patties, American cheese, bun; no toppings like lettuce or tomatoes included in base.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, patty size, and cooking method. Check Five Guys app or menu for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Five Guys cheeseburger has about 980 kcal and 39 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant data.

tweaks.label: Little burger (one patty instead of two)

faqs.q: How many calories in 5 guys cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Approximately 980 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What are the macros for calories in 5 guys burger?
faqs.a: About 39 g carbs, 39 g protein, 62 g fat.

faqs.q: Are calories in 5 guys higher with toppings?
faqs.a: Yes, extras like A1 sauce or grilled mushrooms add 50â€“200 kcal.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a 5 guys burger?
faqs.a: Around 1240 mg, mostly from cheese and seasoning.
Regular fries are about 953 kcal; not included in burger totals.
